name: The Grape Royale
recipeIngredient: 1/4 ounce grappa (Café Gray uses Nonino Merlot grappa)
4 1/2 ounces Vouvray Foreau, sparkling white wine or Champagne

recipeInstructions.text: Stir first two ingredients in a Champagne flute and top off with chilled sparkling wine. Garnish with grapes dusted in sugar, hung on the side of the glass.
